/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a two-lane road, divided by a median, with a sidewalk running parallel to it on the right side. 

On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. 

In the distance, the cityscape of Beijing unfolds. Buildings of various sizes and shapes fill the background, interspersed with patches of greenery. The overall scene is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
